articles.title: U.S. House Democrats elect Hakeem Jeffries as first Black party leader - Reuters
articles.description: Hakeem Jeffries was unanimously elected on Wednesday to become the Democratic Party's top leader in the U.S. House of Representatives beginning in January, making him the first Black American to hold such a high-ranking position in Congress.
